transcript:
Customer: Sir ji baat kar sakte hain?

(silence)

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Uh, Subhi ma'am aap se baat karni hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan, bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Uh, good afternoon, main Ravish baat kar raha hoon. Air Machine Mister.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Uh, ma'am meri profile hai woh live ho gayi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abhi aapki free list mein hai, fir uske baad isko abhi paid services ke liye main uh
Executive: uh baaki hoon, woh abhi check karke usko fir update kar rahe hain mujhe.
Customer: Nahi sir lekin ma'am isko aaj hi karwana please.
Executive: Haan haan main try ki hoon meri baat hui hai abhi just aapne aapke phone mein aapko diya uske just pehle hi maine call karke bola hai unko. Toh woh bole hain check karke main isko uh issue karta hoon.
Customer: Accha ma'am woh check karke in the sense kya tha?
Executive: Ab woh issue karenge matlab yahan se process karenge aage process karenge tab fir uske baad woh activate hogi haan.
Customer: Ma'am toh fir abhi aaj possible hai kya ma'am?
Executive: Uh sir main abhi ek confirm toh nahi bata sakti but main try karti hoon ki aaj ho jaaye.
Customer: Haan kyunki ma'am kal Saturday hai fir sab band ho jayega.
Executive: Haan haan main aaj try karke aapko confirm kar deti hoon kya hoga.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am. Accha ek issue aur tha mera.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Jo complaint ki thi ma'am mere upar Rajesh Prajapati ne.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh woh humne resolve karwa di hai. Ab woh ma'am fir humko bol raha hai ki aap ek kaam kariye jo bhi hamara loss hua uska humko aap ₹70,000 daliye. Nahi toh hum fir complaint kar denge. Toh kya yeh possible hai?
Executive: Sir yeh toh matlab agar woh on call bol raha hai toh agar yeh matlab aapka aapke end se toh yeh toh galat hai. Toh aap iske liye record karke unki baat rakhiye aur fir uske baad unko boliye ki nahi aisa na kare woh kyunki agar ek bhi complaint aur iske alawa aayegi toh fir aapka wapas se issue ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi nahi toh ma'am nahi mera yeh kehne ka matlab hai jab mera uska resolve ho gaya woh mujhse bol raha hai ki aap mera loss bhi aap mujhe pay karo.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye main confirm kar le rahi hoon sir se. Ek minute hold karega.



Executive: Problem kya tha? Woh isko dhamka raha hai ki aap mera itna loss hua tha uska ₹70,000 aap daliye nahi toh warna main fir complaint kar dunga. Toh agar kyunki aur maine abhi just baat kiya hai jo inka handle kar rahe hain BS conflict toh woh bol rahe hain ki agar ek bhi complaint aati hai toh wapas se company band kar denge aur abki baar wapas se hogi bhi nahi woh. Toh yeh yeh jaanna chah rahe hain ki yeh possible hai kya? Yeh possible hai kya ki agar woh aisa fake complaint karega toh us basis pe mere mein koi issue aaye. Toh mera toh yahi suggestion hai ki aap unka call recording rakhiye aisi baatein toh is cheez pe.
[unintelligible]
Executive: Haan fake hai haan. Wahi toh agar aapke paas proof rahega toh woh fake allegation maana nahi jayega.
[unintelligible]
Executive: But woh yeh keh raha hai ki aap mera ₹70,000 aur pay kariye mere uh loss ka. Haan wahi baat hai na yeh matlab toh hota nahi hai ab woh toh galat bol raha hai. Toh mera toh yahi suggestion rahega inko ki yeh uh matlab unko calling karke puchein.
[unintelligible]
Executive: Haan. [unintelligible] customer ke sath sab woh concept hai to provide. But agar is purane mein kuch dobara se conflict khatam ho gaya hai. Kyunki aapne settle kar diya hai. Ab settle karne ke baad dobara se khologe. Logically woh settle ho gaya settle activate ho raha hai. Toh jab woh current deal pe dobara se agar kuch [unintelligible] koi agar naya issue aa raha hai to aap iska complaint ko valid purane complaint ko valid nahi maani. Woh khatam ho gaya. Yeh isko khatam ho gaya. Theek hai main bata deti hoon unko sir ko. Hello?
Customer: Haan ma'am.
Executive: Haan. Sir maine baat kiya hai toh unhone yeh kaha hai matlab mere manager jo hain ki main ek bari yeh jo conflict aapka handle kar rahe the unse baat karke ek baar woh confirm kar le rahe hain ki aisa toh possible hona nahi chahiye ki agar woh fir se fake allegation lagaye ki matlab jo ek complaint ek baar resolve ho chuki hai uh us resolve complaint pe agar woh uh jo aapka Rajesh Prajapati tha person woh agar dobara complaint karta hai toh kya woh us basis pe uh complaint wapas se open hogi nahi hogi ya fir kyunki agar koi dusri complaint dusra hi supplier karega tab buyer karega tabhi hum complaint lenge na toh yeh ek cheez confirm karni hai. Uske baad.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am dekhiye usne kya kiya usse humne resolution liya toh usne aage badh ke IndiaMART ko phone lagaya bole mera jo tha woh solve ho gaya. Theek hai. Ab usne kya notice kiya ki mera IndiaMART wapas chalu ho gaya hai. Ab IndiaMART pe bylead aa hi nahi hai aur bylead aaye ne aane ke pehle usne teen char baar IndiaMART ke usme call kar liya. Understand kya bolte hain jo matlab mere number pe jo IndiaMART pe mera PNS number hai. Hai na? Wahan humne uthaya toh bol raha hai bhaiya aapki chalu ho gayi hai. Main kaha haan. Toh fir woh toh bol raha hai mujhko ki aap ek kaam kariye jo mera loss hua aap pay kar dijiye. Toh main kaha pagal se baat kar rahe ho kya yaar mujhse. Toh yeh cheez ho rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi toh aap yeh baat yeh haan yeh baat aap ek baar recording recorded call pe rakhiye.
Customer: Nahi mere paas WhatsApp nahi mere paas WhatsApp pe hai WhatsApp chat mein. Haan. Haan. Toh maine mana kar diya maine kaha kyun dunga bhai. Toh bolna bhaiya ek kaam karo fir tumhara IndiaMART wapas se band kara raha hoon main. Toh nahi aap ek kaam kariye na yeh WhatsApp chat bhi rakhe rahiye aur agar woh phone karke aapko aisa kuch bolta hai ya toh aap woh ya toh bulwaiye usse aisa kuch ki apne end se aap ek baar safe side rakhiye apne liye nahi toh warna fir agar baad mein kuch issue aayega toh fir aap as a proof kya aap show kar payenge.
Customer: Nahi woh toh hai mere paas. Haan jab woh hai toh fir chaliye fir hum jo bhi hota hai hum complaint ke regarding fir aapka ek baar yeh yeh wala cheez confirm kara dete hain ki kya cheez hai wapas se woh complaint open hogi nahi hogi kya hoga woh hum sir abhi baat kar le rahe hain khud hi.
Executive: Nahi ma'am usko aap rehne do pata chala ki jo bhi jo chalu kar rahe hain fir woh Rajesh Prajapati ko phone kiye. Theek hai. Aur jahan usne phone kiye toh fir ma'am usne bol diya usne. Yeh hamare end se rahega uska aap tension nahi lijiye.
Customer: Haan. Matlab aisa aisa nahi ki woh Rajesh Prajapati ko phone kare fir woh kuch naya bahana maar de mauka dekh ke toh fir faltu mein isko fas jaye.
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hona chahiye main baat kar le rahi hoon sir se ek baar detail mein aisa aisa scene hai ek baar woh confirm kar lenge toh ho jayega.
Customer: Haan. Nahi matlab aap unko mana hi kar do ki phone bhi mat karo jab woh karega toh tab mere paas jo proof hai na woh main de dunga. Toh fir aise problem yeh ho jayegi na ki agar kahin fir se agar woh ek bhi complaint dala us chakkar mein aapki profile wapas se band hogi fir wapas se issue karne mein sab time jayega. But ek baar aisa confirm rahega toh aap bhi apne end se safe rahenge woh bhi uh jo team hai hamari woh bhi hum apne end se sahi rahegi.
Customer: Are ma'am woh aadmi thoda woh thoda thoda pagal type ka aadmi hai. Hai na? Uska dimag thoda thoda hila hua hai. Haan. Haan. Ab woh pata chala ki ma'am koi IndiaMART se phone kiya uske paas ki sir aapne aisa kaha woh usse koi naya bahana maar de fir meri profile ruk jaaye aur ma'am aap jante ho ma'am ek mahine se band hai mera kaam pura. Toh main chah nahi raha ki usko haan ki usko koi aadmi baat bhi kare. Mera nivedan aapse yahi hai ki matlab usko apne tak hi aap rakho bas meri profile chalu kara do. Ki uska jab woh hoga toh fir usko pe main dekh lunga mere hisab se. Ki jo bhi proof mere paas rahenge woh main de dunga.
Executive: Okay okay okay no issues. Theek hai main iske regarding confirm karti hoon profile kab aapka wapas se re-onboarding ho raha hai.
Customer: Bas ma'am humble request bas isko aaj aap kara do please kyunki aaj nahi hona please Monday Tuesday chala jayega.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir. Main apne end se try kar rahi hoon pura baat kar le rahi hoon aap abhi maine manager se bhi bata diya hai ki aapka re-onboarding wala scene hai. Woh bol rahe hain theek hai hum dekh ke karwa dete hain.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am theek hai. Confirm karte hain aapko.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thank you ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's profile is live but in free list.

- Rajesh Prajapati asking for ₹70,000 for loss.

- Rajesh Prajapati threatening to file complaint again.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to try activating profile today.

- Advised to record calls with Rajesh Prajapati.

- Executive will confirm if complaint can be reopened.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm profile activation.



Alert (If Any):

complaint, refund, fake allegation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, complaint, refund, activation, allegation
